recipes.name: Chicken Curry
steps: 1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute until fragrant.
3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften and oil starts to separate.
4. Add curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, and salt. Stir well and cook for a few minutes.
5. Add the chicken pieces and cook until they are browned on all sides.
6. Lower the heat, add the yogurt, and stir to coat the chicken evenly.
7. Pour in the coconut milk, bring to a simmer, and cook covered for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
8. Stir in garam masala and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
9. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or naan.

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
steps: 1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking pan.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
3. In another bowl, beat the eggs and oil together until well combined.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the grated carrots, crushed pineapple, chopped walnuts, and vanilla extract.
6. Pour the batter into the prepared baking pan and spread evenly.
7. Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool completely in the pan before frosting with cream cheese frosting, if desired.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
steps: 1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans.
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
3. Add the eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.
4. Stir in the boiling water (the batter will be thin).
5. Pour the batter into the prepared pans and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Cool the cakes in the pans for 10 minutes, then remove them from the pans and cool completely on wire racks.
7. Frost with your favorite chocolate frosting or ganache.

recipes.name: Fish Soup
steps: 1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped onions, carrots, celery, and garlic. Sauté until the vegetables are softened.
2. Add the diced potatoes, bay leaf, thyme, and fish or vegetable stock. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
3. Add the cubed fish and cook for another 5-7 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
4. Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Remove the bay leaf and garnish the soup with fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Mushroom Soup
steps: 1. In a large pot, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic, and sauté until soft and translucent.
2. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their juices and begin to brown.
3. Sprinkle the flour over the mushrooms and stir well to combine. Cook for 1-2 minutes to remove the raw flour taste.
4. Gradually add the chicken or vegetable stock, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
5. Add the dried thyme and bring the soup to a boil. Reduce the heat and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
6. Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth, or leave it chunky if you prefer.
7. Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste.
8. Garnish with fresh parsley and serve hot.
